Hello! I’m an artist focused on creating visually engaging work across 2D, 3D, and digital design. I’m passionate about blending traditional art with modern tools to bring concepts to life - from initial sketch to final render.

What I Do

  • Concept Art & Illustration
  • 3D Modeling & Texturing
  • Compositing & Motion Graphics
  • Visual Development & Storyboarding

Software I Use

  • Blender, ZBrush, Substance Painter
  • Photoshop, Illustrator, Procreate
  • Adobe After Effects

3D art and design
